workExperience.mainTitle: As a developer with experience in PHP, Laravel, Python, Java, MySQL, other relational databases and web tools, my goal is create high quality and innovative solutions, seeking constantly improving my skills and contributing to the success of projects and development teams.
description: I am a professional with 8 years of experience in web development, specializing in backend, using PHP and Python. My skills include:
• Development of robust applications with PHP, using frameworks such as Laravel, in addition to Python.
• Creation of frontend interfaces with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript and ReactJS, aiming at a fluid and responsive user experience.
• Proficiency in relational databases (MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL) and non-relational (MongoDB), ensuring efficient and secure data management.
• Implementation of RESTful and SOAP APIs, promoting efficient integration between systems.
• Experience in building microservices, optimizing scalability and maintaining distributed systems.
• Commitment to good programming practices and clean code, ensuring software quality and maintainability.
I seek to integrate high-performance teams, where I can expand my skills and contribute significantly to the growth of the organization.
I am motivated to apply as much my theoretical and practical knowledge to face challenges and drive the success of innovative projects.
